entity.prefix: an object that is used to call the entity
entity.name: the name of the entitity
entity.type: the data type of the entitiy

parameters.name: the name of the parameter
parameters.type: the data type of the parameter
parameters.default: the default value of the parameter
parameters.parameters: an array of parameters used to represent an options object with deafults

entity.returns: the return value of the entitity if it returns

class.name: class name
class.constructor: An entity for the constructor. Prefix and type can be omitted
class.instance: An array of entities corresponding the properties of a class instance. Prefix can be omitted
class.static: An array of entities corresponding to the static methods of the class. Prefix can be omitted
